name: Metal Gear Dracula - Team 7
description:
PLAY WITH SOUND

Baddies invade Draculas caste. So Dracula takes them down in typical Vampire fashion: With a Machine Gun. Jk you can also bite them.

Enemies get angry if they see you in a mirror and have a line of sight. This is because you are a vampire, and vampires dont have mirror images (duh).

Bullets bounce off mirrors. If you shoot, enemies get angry  so try to kill them  in stealth by biting them - like a real vampire would. People might get angry if you bite their friends and they see you.

Mirrors are marked with a white bar above them

This game is very hard! Every bullet kills you instantly. This is obviously,  because the baddies are well-equipped with silver bullets

Team 7!!

install:

Windows: Extract EVERYTHING from Zip - use Vampire.exe
Linux: Extract Everything - execute Metal Gear Dracula executable
